name: Mutations
description:
The collapse of ecosystems, the tyranny and greed of bureaucratic institutions. Misinformation, disinformation, and conspiracy theories, breaking down human rationality and belief in science. All leading to the destruction of life as we know it. Earth crumbling around us.

‘Mutations’ = humanity’s destructive tendencies, twisted into a form we cannot control or even perceive combined with primeval nature, metastasizing and using it’s power to create a balanced symbiotic relationship between humanity and the organic world.

Inspired by the book, Annihilation by Jeff VanderMeer and the 2018 film adaptation, directed by Alex Garland. Art by @Dehiscenceart 2021, 4200px X 6600 px
